channel.title: CVE Feed for consolekit -- all

item.title: CVE-2010-4664|2024-08-07T03:51:17.985Z -- consolekit -- consolekit
item.description: In ConsoleKit before 0.4.2, an intended security policy restriction bypass was found. This flaw allows an authenticated system user to escalate their privileges by initiating a remote VNC session.
